item.description:
What's New in DockFlow 1.65

Major Improvements

  • Custom Spacers – Create your own spacer items with either custom text or an image, giving you more control over how sections are organized in your Dock.
  • More Flexible Dock Organization – Go beyond standard macOS spacing options and build clearer visual groups that match your real workflows.

Why It Matters

  • Faster Navigation – Clear grouping makes it easier to recognize app clusters at a glance and move between tasks with less friction.
  • Workflow-First Customization – Personalize your layout in a practical way that supports focus, not just appearance.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!
